> A new 1 hand slasher?
>
> Kicsc Der Pavz: Damage 10, Delay 38. +5 dex.
> Effect of Strong Poison.
> Wt. 8. Magic, lore, no drop. Classes: B, Ro, SK,
> Wr. Found in Split Paw.
>
> Anyone know which mob (& where located) drops this?
> Anyone know if it can
> be wielded in the offhand?
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. http://everquest.allakhazam.com/ was under 1H
> Slashing weps.
>
>

This is from Everlore.

This sword is dropped by Tesch Val Deval'Nmak,
a level 39 or so gnoll warrior who spawns in the
old shaman lenrel/high shaman grisok spot, which
is one of the rooms behind the Verishe Mal Judges
spot. It looks like a Longsword when worn (not a
2hander as someone said before). The proc does 30
DD and then 270 or so damage in a VERY slow dot
(takes a minute or two to do all the damage).

Couldn't determine if this weapon is wieldable in the
off hand.

Good hunting,

Tomerrilin
